Name: Haldor
About the game: Haldor - game about the same name character. Plunge into the exciting souls-like rpg. Try your hand at becoming the revenge of the ancient Scandinavian warrior. Take revenge for your kind, fight with various opponents, go through obstacles and prove by defeating the cold, loneliness, pain and despair that your people will not be completely conquered for many more centuries! You need to enter the dark dungeon and kill all the evil that you will get into it. Also you will go through various traps and labyrinths, in which you can find a reward for your diligence or a sinister boss. Features: * Beautiful graphics. * Good AI * Change of time of day and weather conditions. * Rich soundtrack. * A variety of weapons for you and your enemies.
